A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst star wars movie to date. The movie is almost completely pointless\, and where its not its only relevance is inexplicably killing off characters without any explanation. Want to know who snoke is? Nope. Reys parents? Nope. Apart from 2 scenes\, we could've skipped right to ep 9\, and even those two scened are bad.
